[才]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) — a sharp peg. Same as 弋 and 尗 . See also the top component of 𢦏 .
Xu Shen erroneously analyzed this character as a sprout growing from the ground.

[儕]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *zriːl ): semantic 人 + phonetic 齊 ( OC *zliːl, *zliːls ) .

[濟]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ʔsliːlʔ, *ʔsliːls ): semantic 水 ( “ water ” ) + phonetic 齊 ( OC *zliːl, *zliːls ) .

[济]
Simplified from 濟 ( 齊 → 齐 ).
